title: Mobile/fixed market share of Vodafone in its main markets 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.
There is a gap of 214.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Fixed market in Country Germany and South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
Averaging all 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market, the Country Germany is the maximum Market share and United Kingdom is the minimum Market share.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

For Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Mobile market had the highest Market share 463.0 among the 2 groups and in South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Fixed market had the lowest Market share 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.
There is a gap of 214.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Fixed market in Country Germany and South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

Out of all 2 groups, Mobile market had the highest Market share for Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Fixed market had the lowest Market share for Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
For Country Germany, Fixed market had the highest Market share among all 6 Countrys and it has the lowest Market share in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
There is a gap of 214.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Fixed market in Country Germany and South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
Among the groups, Mobile market had the biggest difference in Market share. Where the maximum Market share was 2.66 times larger than the minimum Market share.
Averaging all 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market, the Country Germany is the maximum Market share and United Kingdom is the minimum Market share.
